news.title: CHS's NOC not needed to sell, rent flats, says Maharashtra housing minister
news.para: State housing minister Jitendra Awhad, who is the NCP MLA from Mumbra, said all that a flat owner needs from a housing society at the time of selling a flat is a no dues pending certificate.

news.title: Prestige Estates sales bookings up 90% to record Rs 10,382 crore in FY22
news.para: The sales bookings of Bengaluru-based Prestige Estates came in higher than Macrotech Developers, which markets its properties under the Lodha brand. Macrotech reported 51 per cent growth in its sales booking to a record Rs 9,024 crore during the last fiscal.

news.title: Himachal Pradesh HC issues notices over regularization of illegal construction
news.para: The petitioner has alleged that entire state of Himachal Pradesh is in danger on account of erratic, irrational and uncontrolled construction of housing and commercial complexes. The respondents have been directed to file reply and the matter has been fixed for May 9.

news.title: Panchkula civic body to hold camps to resolve tax issues
news.para: Officials said that on April 13, a special camp for residents living in Sector 15 and nearby areas would be held at Jain Bhawan in Sector 15 from 9am to 4pm.

news.title: Brick cost up by Rs 1, GST hike hits kilns across Uttar Pradesh
news.para: The move resulted in the price of bricks increasing by about Re 1 each, thereby "burning another hole in the pocket of the common man who wishes to build his dream home", said a statement by brick kiln owners.

news.title: Relief for 1,475 buildings in Bengaluru development body's Karanth Layout
news.para: The committee has texted the information to the owners of the above buildings and planned to issue regularization certificates (RC)to them soon, Justice Chandrashekar told reporters on Tuesday. The BDA has specially designed these RCs, he added.

news.title: Madurai corporation councils okay property tax hike
news.para: ​Property tax revision has become mandatory to get the funding for central government projects like Swacch Bharat 2.0 and AMRUT 2.0. The administrative cost and the economic index have increased manifolds in the cities.

news.title: Indore civic body demolishes 20 commercial, residential units
news.para: According to IMC deputy commissioner Lata Agrawal, there were as many as 17 shops and three residential structures that had encroached upon government land next to MG Road police station.

news.title: Institutional investments in real estate jumps over two-fold to $1.1 billion in Jan-Mar
news.para: "Institutional investments in Indian real estate touched USD 1.1 billion during Q1 2022, doubling from the same period last year. The opening up of the economy post the third wave of COVID-19 infections, and an improvement in investors' sentiment has led to surging investments, compared to the prior quarter," Colliers India said in a statement.

news.title: Experts urge Delhi RERA to remove 'apartment' loophole
news.para: Using the loophole, many developers in posh colonies of Delhi have been avoiding the registration, claiming that the number of apartments is less than eight and to register their project, they have to meet both conditions.

news.title: Structural safety certificate from project engineer must be made mandatory: CAC
news.para: The third meeting of the Central Advisory Council (CAC), constituted under the Real Estate (Regulation and Development) Act, 2016, called as RERA, was held on Tuesday under the chairmanship of the Union Housing and Urban Affairs Minister Hardeep Singh Puri.

news.title: States should not dilute RERA provisions: Housing minister
news.para: During the meeting, measures to ensure structural safety in high-rise buildings and prevent loss of life as well as property, besides considering a proposal to set up a high-level panel to address the issue of stalled projects, was discussed.

news.title: Sunac China misses $29.5 million coupon payment
news.para: The payment for the 7.96% bond maturing in October 2023 has a 30-day grace period before triggering a default. Another source close to the company said Sunac is trying to find a funding solution to meet the payment deadline.

news.title: NCLAT stays formation of creditors' panel for Ananda Divine Developers
news.para: Earlier on March 25, the Delhi bench of the National Company Law Tribunal (NCLT) had initiated insolvency proceedings against Ananda Divine Developers over a plea filed by ICICI Prudential Venture, claiming a due of Rs 25 crore.

news.title: CPPIB to invest Rs 2,600 crore for 49% stake in Tata Realty's two office parks
news.para: TATA Realty and Infrastructure MD and CEO Sanjay Dutt said the company has formed a partnership with CPPIB to develop and own commercial real estate assets as it remains bullish about future potential of office market across major Indian cities.
